mapper.select:
SELECT snd701b.STDR_YM AS stdrYm /* 기준년월 */ , snd701b.DPRT_CD AS dprtCd /* 부점코드 */ , snd701b.RGST_SN AS rgstSn /* 등록일련번호 */ , snd701b.BSS_ASST_MNGM_NO AS bssAsstMngmNo /* 기초자산관리번호 */ , snd701b.RPTS_IEM_MNGM_NO AS rptsIemMngmNo /* 보고서항목관리번호 */ , snd701b.CMP_NM AS cmpNm /* 회사명 */ , snd701b.FSS_CMP_CD AS fssCmpCd /* 금융감독원회사코드 */ , snd701b.WRTN_STDR_DT AS wrtnStdrDt /* 작성기준일자 */ , snd701b.PRDT_NM AS prdtNm /* 상품명 */ , snd701b.CTRT_DT AS ctrtDt /* 계약일자 */ , snd701b.EXP_DT AS expDt /* 만기일자 */ , snd701b.RPTS_CTRT_TP_CD AS rptsCtrtTpCd /* 보고서계약유형코드 */ , snd701b.RPTS_CTRT_TP_DETL_CD AS rptsCtrtTpDetlCd /* 보고서계약유형상세코드 */ , snd701b.FRS_CTRC_AMT AS frsCtrcAmt /* 최초약정금액 */ , snd701b.EPRZ_CRDL_NOW_CTRC_BLCE AS eprzCrdlNowCtrcBlce /* 기업여신현재약정잔액 */ , snd701b.DET_GRTE_FEE AS detGrteFee /* 채무보증수수료 */ , snd701b.DET_GRTE_FLFL_DCD AS detGrteFlflDcd /* 채무보증이행구분코드 */ , snd701b.PF_THCS_DCD AS pfThcsDcd /* PF해당구분코드 */ , snd701b.PF_TP_DCD AS pfTpDcd /* PF유형구분코드 */ , snd701b.PF_SLLT_TP_DCD AS pfSlltTpDcd /* PF분양유형구분코드 */ , snd701b.PF_ERN_TP_DCD AS pfErnTpDcd /* PF수익유형구분코드 */ , snd701b.PF_BSS_ASST_LCLS_CD AS pfBssAsstLclsCd /* PF기초자산대분류코드 */ , snd701b.PF_BSS_ASST_SCLS_CD AS pfBssAsstSclsCd /* PF기초자산소분류코드 */ , snd701b.RLES_TP_DCD AS rlesTpDcd /* 부동산유형구분코드 */ , snd701b.BSS_ASST_LCTP_DCD AS bssAsstLctpDcd /* 기초자산소재지구분코드 */ , snd701b.RLES_LCTP_ZPCD AS rlesLctpZpcd /* 부동산소재지우편번호 */ , snd701b.LCTP_ADDR AS lctpAddr /* 소재지주소 */ , snd701b.PF_OVRS_LCT_NTN_CD AS pfOvrsLctNtnCd /* PF해외소재국가코드 */ , snd701b.OVRS_LCT_CTY_NM AS ovrsLctCtyNm /* 해외소재도시명 */ , snd701b.UNSLD_THCS_DCD AS unsldThcsDcd /* 미분양해당구분코드 */ , snd701b.WRTE_MBDY_NM AS wrteMbdyNm /* 피보증주체명 */ , snd701b.WRTE_MBDY_CRNO AS wrteMbdyCrno /* 피보증주체법인등록번호 */ , snd701b.LQDZ_SCTY_GRTE_THCS_DCD AS lqdzSctyGrteThcsDcd /* 유동화증권보증해당구분코드 */ , snd701b.LQDZ_SCTY_NM AS lqdzSctyNm /* 유동화증권명 */ , snd701b.LQDZ_SCTY_KND_CD AS lqdzSctyKndCd /* 유동화증권종류코드 */ , snd701b.LQDZ_SCTY_ISU_DT AS lqdzSctyIsuDt /* 유동화증권발행일자 */ , snd701b.LQDZ_SCTY_PAR_AMT AS lqdzSctyParAmt /* 유동화증권액면금액 */ , snd701b.LQDZ_SCTY_ISU_INTRT AS lqdzSctyIsuIntrt /* 유동화증권발행금리 */ , snd701b.FRS_INV_POT_LTV_RTO AS frsInvPotLtvRto /* 최초투자시점LTV비율 */ , snd701b.WRTN_STDR_DE_LTV_RTO AS wrtnStdrDeLtvRto /* 작성기준일LTV비율 */ , snd701b.LTV_OUTPUT_MTH_DCD AS ltvOutputMthDcd /* LTV산출방법구분코드 */ , snd701b.APRS_PRC AS aprsPrc /* 감정가격 */ , snd701b.TOT_SLLT_AMT AS totSlltAmt /* 총분양금액 */ , snd701b.JDGM_TEAM_PRSM_AMT AS jdgmTeamPrsmAmt /* 심사팀추정금액 */ , snd701b.PYBK_RANK_DCD AS pybkRankDcd /* 변제순위구분코드 */ , snd701b.RLES_RENT_GRTE_AMT AS rlesRentGrteAmt /* 부동산임대보증금액 */ , snd701b.PRFD_RANK_AMT AS prfdRankAmt /* 우선순위금액 */ , snd701b.SODR_AMT AS sodrAmt /* 동순위금액 */ , snd701b.BKBN_AMT AS bkbnAmt /* 후순위금액 */ , snd701b.OTCM_CRDT_RIFC_THCS_DCD AS otcmCrdtRifcThcsDcd /* 타사신용보강해당구분코드 */ , snd701b.OTCM_CRDT_RIFC_MN_DCD AS otcmCrdtRifcMnDcd /* 타사신용보강수단구분코드 */ , snd701b.SQ1_CRDT_RIFC_CMP_NM AS sq1CrdtRifcCmpNm /* 1차신용보강회사명 */ , snd701b.SQ1_CRDT_RIFC_CMP_CRNO AS sq1CrdtRifcCmpCrno /* 1차신용보강회사법인등록번호 */ , snd701b.SQ1_CRDT_RIFC_CMP_CRDT_GRD_CD AS sq1CrdtRifcCmpCrdtGrdCd /* 1차신용보강회사신용등급코드 */ , snd701b.SQ2_CRDT_RIFC_CMP_NM AS sq2CrdtRifcCmpNm /* 2차신용보강회사명 */ , snd701b.SQ2_CRDT_RIFC_CMP_CRNO AS sq2CrdtRifcCmpCrno /* 2차신용보강회사법인등록번호 */ , snd701b.SQ2_CRDT_RIFC_CMP_CRDT_GRD_CD AS sq2CrdtRifcCmpCrdtGrdCd /* 2차신용보강회사신용등급코드 */ , snd701b.EFCE_CMP_NM AS efceCmpNm /* 시행회사명 */ , snd701b.EFCE_CMP_CRNO AS efceCmpCrno /* 시행회사법인등록번호 */ , snd701b.PF_EFCE_SHP_DCD AS pfEfceShpDcd /* PF시행형태구분코드 */ , snd701b.PF_BUSI_APVL_STEP_CD AS pfBusiApvlStepCd /* PF사업승인단계코드 */ , snd701b.PF_CSST_STEP_CD AS pfCsstStepCd /* PF착공단계코드 */ , snd701b.PF_SLLT_STEP_CD AS pfSlltStepCd /* PF분양단계코드 */ , snd701b.PF_CNFN_STEP_CD AS pfCnfnStepCd /* PF준공단계코드 */ , snd701b.TOT_BUSI_AMT AS totBusiAmt /* 총사업금액 */ , snd701b.RVNU_AMT AS rvnuAmt /* 매출금액 */ , snd701b.SLF_CPTA AS slfCpta /* 자기자본금 */ , snd701b.UN_SQMS_SLLT_AMT AS unSqmsSlltAmt /* 단위면적분양금액 */ , snd701b.MDWY_GOLD_RDMP_RTO AS mdwyGoldRdmpRto /* 중도금상환비율 */ , snd701b.ALL_SQMS AS allSqms /* 전체면적 */ , snd701b.ESTM_EMRM_RT AS estmEmrmRt /* 예상공실율 */ , snd701b.UN_SQMS_ESTM_RENT_ERN_AMT AS unSqmsEstmRentErnAmt /* 단위면적예상임대수익금액 */ , snd701b.UN_SQMS_ESTM_RENT_CT AS unSqmsEstmRentCt /* 단위면적예상임대비용 */ , snd701b.ESTM_PUR_BSN_ERN_AMT AS estmPurBsnErnAmt /* 예상순수영업수익금액 */ , snd701b.PF_STLN_TOT_LOAN_AMT AS pfStlnTotLoanAmt /* PF대주총대출금액 */ , snd701b.PF_STLN_PTCI_ISTT_NUM AS pfStlnPtciIsttNum /* PF대주참여기관수 */ , snd701b.PF_STLN_LOAN_EXP_DT AS pfStlnLoanExpDt /* PF대주대출만기일자 */ , snd701b.SQ1_STLN_ISTT_NM AS sq1StlnIsttNm /* 1차대주기관명 */ , snd701b.SQ1_STLN_ISTT_CRNO AS sq1StlnIsttCrno /* 1차대주기관법인등록번호 */ , snd701b.SQ1_STLN_LOAN_AMT AS sq1StlnLoanAmt /* 1차대주대출금액 */ , snd701b.SQ2_STLN_ISTT_NM AS sq2StlnIsttNm /* 2차대주기관명 */ , snd701b.SQ2_STLN_ISTT_CRNO AS sq2StlnIsttCrno /* 2차대주기관법인등록번호 */ , snd701b.SQ2_STLN_LOAN_AMT AS sq2StlnLoanAmt /* 2차대주대출금액 */ , snd701b.SQ3_STLN_ISTT_NM AS sq3StlnIsttNm /* 3차대주기관명 */ , snd701b.SQ3_STLN_ISTT_CRNO AS sq3StlnIsttCrno /* 3차대주기관법인등록번호 */ , snd701b.SQ3_STLN_LOAN_AMT AS sq3StlnLoanAmt /* 3차대주대출금액 */ , snd701b.SQ4_STLN_ISTT_NM AS sq4StlnIsttNm /* 4차대주기관명 */ , snd701b.SQ4_STLN_ISTT_CRNO AS sq4StlnIsttCrno /* 4차대주기관법인등록번호 */ , snd701b.SQ4_STLN_LOAN_AMT AS sq4StlnLoanAmt /* 4차대주대출금액 */ , snd701b.SQ5_STLN_ISTT_NM AS sq5StlnIsttNm /* 5차대주기관명 */ , snd701b.SQ5_STLN_ISTT_CRNO AS sq5StlnIsttCrno /* 5차대주기관법인등록번호 */ , snd701b.SQ5_STLN_LOAN_AMT AS sq5StlnLoanAmt /* 5차대주대출금액 */ , snd701b.BUSI_APVL_RQS_DT AS busiApvlRqsDt /* 사업승인신청일자 */ , snd701b.LAND_PCHS_RT AS landPchsRt /* 토지매입율 */ , snd701b.RSPL_CNFN_CFRM_THCS_DCD AS rsplCnfnCfrmThcsDcd /* 책임준공확약해당구분코드 */ , snd701b.RSPL_CNFN_CFRM_ISTT_NM AS rsplCnfnCfrmIsttNm /* 책임준공확약기관명 */ , snd701b.RSPL_CNFN_CFRM_ISTT_CRNO AS rsplCnfnCfrmIsttCrno /* 책임준공확약기관법인등록번호 */ , snd701b.RSPL_CNFN_EPRZ_CRDT_GRD_CD AS rsplCnfnEprzCrdtGrdCd /* 책임준공기업신용등급코드 */ , snd701b.CSUC_CMP_NM AS csucCmpNm /* 시공회사명 */ , snd701b.CSUC_CMP_CRNO AS csucCmpCrno /* 시공회사법인등록번호 */ , snd701b.CSUC_CMP_EPRZ_CRDT_GRD_CD AS csucCmpEprzCrdtGrdCd /* 시공회사기업신용등급코드 */ , snd701b.CSST_DT AS csstDt /* 착공일자 */ , snd701b.CNFN_DT AS cnfnDt /* 준공일자 */ , snd701b.PLN_FAIR_RT AS plnFairRt /* 계획공정율 */ , snd701b.EXC_FAIR_RT AS excFairRt /* 실행공정율 */ , snd701b.SLLT_RT AS slltRt /* 분양율 */ , snd701b.SLLT_OPNG_DT AS slltOpngDt /* 분양개시일자 */ , snd701b.MOIN_RT AS moinRt /* 입주율 */ , snd701b.EXIT_SLLT_RT AS exitSlltRt /* EXIT분양율 */ , snd701b.DVR_SQMS AS dvrSqms /* 전용면적 */ , snd701b.DVR_SQMS_UN_AMT AS dvrSqmsUnAmt /* 전용면적단위금액 */ , snd701b.RENT_PSBL_TOT_SQMS AS rentPsblTotSqms /* 임대가능총면적 */ , snd701b.EMRM_RT AS emrmRt /* 공실율 */ , snd701b.UN_SQMS_RENT_ERN_AMT AS unSqmsRentErnAmt /* 단위면적임대수익금액 */ , snd701b.UN_SQMS_RENT_CT AS unSqmsRentCt /* 단위면적임대비용 */ , snd701b.SQ1_YRLY_PUR_BSN_ERN_AMT AS sq1YrlyPurBsnErnAmt /* 1차연간순수영업수익금액 */ , snd701b.SQ2_YRLY_PUR_BSN_ERN_AMT AS sq2YrlyPurBsnErnAmt /* 2차연간순수영업수익금액 */ , snd701b.RLES_TOT_LOAN_INTR AS rlesTotLoanIntr /* 부동산총대출이자 */ , snd701b.RLES_TOT_LOAN_PAI_AMT AS rlesTotLoanPaiAmt /* 부동산총대출원리금금액 */ , snd701b.CPTL_RSTR_RT AS cptlRstrRt /* 자본환원율 */ , snd701b.NCR_RSK_VL AS ncrRskVl /* NCR위험값 */ , snd701b.NCR_RSK_AMT AS ncrRskAmt /* NCR위험금액 */ , snd701b.JOB_CHRR_NM AS jobChrrNm /* 업무담당자명 */ , snd701b.DPT_NM AS dptNm /* 부서명 */ , snd701b.CPLC_CTNS AS cplcCtns /* 연락처내용 */ , snd701b.HND_DETL_DTM AS hndDetlDtm /* 조작상세일시 */ , snd701b.HND_EMPNO AS hndEmpno /* 조작사원번호 */ , snd701b.HND_TMNL_NO AS hndTmnlNo /* 조작단말기번호 */ , snd701b.HND_TR_ID AS hndTrId /* 조작거래ID */ , snd701b.GUID AS guid /* GUID */ FROM IBIMS701B snd701b WHERE snd701b.DPRT_CD LIKE #{dptCd} AND snd701b.STDR_YM LIKE CASE WHEN NOT EXISTS( SELECT s701b_1.STDR_YM FROM IBIMS701B s701b_1 WHERE s701b_1.STDR_YM = #{stdrYm} ) THEN #{stdrYm} ELSE #{prvStdrYm} END UNION SELECT /* , T.EPRZ_CRDL_PRDT_LCLS_CD AS rptsCtrtTpCd 계약유형1 (유동성/신용공여형) = 기업여신상품대분류코드 */ /* , NVL(s002b_1.CD_VL_NM , '') AS PRDT_LCLS_CD_NM 기업여신상품대분류코드명 */ /* , T.EPRZ_CRDL_PRDT_MDCL_CD AS rptsCtrtTpDetlCd 계약유형2 (매입약정 등) = 기업여신상품중분류코드 */ /* , NVL(s002b_2.CD_VL_NM , '') AS PRDT_MDCL_CD_NM 기업여신상품중분류코드명 */ /* , T.PF_LOAN_YN AS PF_LOAN_YN PF대출여부*/
NULL AS stdrYm /* 기준년월 */ , NULL AS dprtCd /* 부점코드 */ , NULL AS rgstSn /* 등록일련번호 */ , NULL AS bssAsstMngmNo /* 기초자산관리번호 */ , NULL AS rptsIemMngmNo /* 보고서항목관리번호 */ , NVL( (SELECT MAX(B1.ENTP_HNGL_NM) FROM IBIMS114B B1 WHERE B1.BSNS_RGST_NO = A.TR_OTHR_DSCM_NO), '') AS cmpNm /* 회사명 */ , NULL AS fssCmpCd /* 금융감독원회사코드 */ , NULL AS wrtnStdrDt /* 작성기준일자 */ , A.PRDT_NM AS prdtNm /* 계약명칭 */ , T.CTRC_DT AS ctrtDt /* 계약일 */ , T.CTRC_EXP_DT AS expDt /* 만기일자 */ , NULL AS rptsCtrtTpCd /* 보고서계약유형코드 */ , NULL AS rptsCtrtTpDetlCd /* 보고서계약유형상세코드 */ , T.EPRZ_CRDL_CTRC_AMT AS frsCtrcAmt /* 최초 약정금액 */ , CASE WHEN T.EPRZ_CRDL_PRDT_LCLS_CD = '90' THEN T.DEAL_EXC_BLCE /* 상품대분류(90:대출)-->SUM(대출잔액) */ ELSE T.EPRZ_CRDL_CTRC_AMT /* 상품대분류(90:대출) 그외 -->기업여신약정금액 */ END AS eprzCrdlNowCtrcBlce /* 약정잔액*/ , NULL AS detGrteFee /* 채무보증수수료 */ , NULL AS detGrteFlflDcd /* 채무보증이행구분코드 */ , NULL AS pfThcsDcd /* PF해당구분코드 */ , NULL AS pfTpDcd /* PF유형구분코드 */ , NULL AS pfSlltTpDcd /* PF분양유형구분코드 */ , NULL AS pfErnTpDcd /* PF수익유형구분코드 */ , NULL AS pfBssAsstLclsCd /* PF기초자산대분류코드 */ , NULL AS pfBssAsstSclsCd /* PF기초자산소분류코드 */ , NULL AS rlesTpDcd /* 부동산유형구분코드 */ , NULL AS bssAsstLctpDcd /* 기초자산소재지구분코드 */ , NULL AS rlesLctpZpcd /* 부동산소재지우편번호 */ , NULL AS lctpAddr /* 소재지주소 */ , NULL AS pfOvrsLctNtnCd /* PF해외소재국가코드 */ , NULL AS ovrsLctCtyNm /* 해외소재도시명 */ , NULL AS unsldThcsDcd /* 미분양해당구분코드 */ , NULL AS wrteMbdyNm /* 피보증주체명 */ , NULL AS wrteMbdyCrno /* 피보증주체법인등록번호 */ , NULL AS lqdzSctyGrteThcsDcd /* 유동화증권보증해당구분코드 */ , NULL AS lqdzSctyNm /* 유동화증권명 */ , NULL AS lqdzSctyKndCd /* 유동화증권종류코드 */ , NULL AS lqdzSctyIsuDt /* 유동화증권발행일자 */ , NULL AS lqdzSctyParAmt /* 유동화증권액면금액 */ , NULL AS lqdzSctyIsuIntrt /* 유동화증권발행금리 */ , NULL AS frsInvPotLtvRto /* 최초투자시점LTV비율 */ , NULL AS wrtnStdrDeLtvRto /* 작성기준일LTV비율 */ , NULL AS ltvOutputMthDcd /* LTV산출방법구분코드 */ , NULL AS aprsPrc /* 감정가격 */ , NULL AS totSlltAmt /* 총분양금액 */ , NULL AS jdgmTeamPrsmAmt /* 심사팀추정금액 */ , NULL AS pybkRankDcd /* 변제순위구분코드 */ , NULL AS rlesRentGrteAmt /* 부동산임대보증금액 */ , NULL AS prfdRankAmt /* 우선순위금액 */ , NULL AS sodrAmt /* 동순위금액 */ , NULL AS bkbnAmt /* 후순위금액 */ , NULL AS otcmCrdtRifcThcsDcd /* 타사신용보강해당구분코드 */ , NULL AS otcmCrdtRifcMnDcd /* 타사신용보강수단구분코드 */ , NULL AS sq1CrdtRifcCmpNm /* 1차신용보강회사명 */ , NULL AS sq1CrdtRifcCmpCrno /* 1차신용보강회사법인등록번호 */ , NULL AS sq1CrdtRifcCmpCrdtGrdCd /* 1차신용보강회사신용등급코드 */ , NULL AS sq2CrdtRifcCmpNm /* 2차신용보강회사명 */ , NULL AS sq2CrdtRifcCmpCrno /* 2차신용보강회사법인등록번호 */ , NULL AS sq2CrdtRifcCmpCrdtGrdCd /* 2차신용보강회사신용등급코드 */ , NULL AS efceCmpNm /* 시행회사명 */ , NULL AS efceCmpCrno /* 시행회사법인등록번호 */ , NULL AS pfEfceShpDcd /* PF시행형태구분코드 */ , NULL AS pfBusiApvlStepCd /* PF사업승인단계코드 */ , NULL AS pfCsstStepCd /* PF착공단계코드 */ , NULL AS pfSlltStepCd /* PF분양단계코드 */ , NULL AS pfCnfnStepCd /* PF준공단계코드 */ , NULL AS totBusiAmt /* 총사업금액 */ , NULL AS rvnuAmt /* 매출금액 */ , NULL AS slfCpta /* 자기자본금 */ , NULL AS unSqmsSlltAmt /* 단위면적분양금액 */ , NULL AS mdwyGoldRdmpRto /* 중도금상환비율 */ , NULL AS allSqms /* 전체면적 */ , NULL AS estmEmrmRt /* 예상공실율 */ , NULL AS unSqmsEstmRentErnAmt /* 단위면적예상임대수익금액 */ , NULL AS unSqmsEstmRentCt /* 단위면적예상임대비용 */ , NULL AS estmPurBsnErnAmt /* 예상순수영업수익금액 */ , NULL AS pfStlnTotLoanAmt /* PF대주총대출금액 */ , NULL AS pfStlnPtciIsttNum /* PF대주참여기관수 */ , NULL AS pfStlnLoanExpDt /* PF대주대출만기일자 */ , NULL AS sq1StlnIsttNm /* 1차대주기관명 */ , NULL AS sq1StlnIsttCrno /* 1차대주기관법인등록번호 */ , NULL AS sq1StlnLoanAmt /* 1차대주대출금액 */ , NULL AS sq2StlnIsttNm /* 2차대주기관명 */ , NULL AS sq2StlnIsttCrno /* 2차대주기관법인등록번호 */ , NULL AS sq2StlnLoanAmt /* 2차대주대출금액 */ , NULL AS sq3StlnIsttNm /* 3차대주기관명 */ , NULL AS sq3StlnIsttCrno /* 3차대주기관법인등록번호 */ , NULL AS sq3StlnLoanAmt /* 3차대주대출금액 */ , NULL AS sq4StlnIsttNm /* 4차대주기관명 */ , NULL AS sq4StlnIsttCrno /* 4차대주기관법인등록번호 */ , NULL AS sq4StlnLoanAmt /* 4차대주대출금액 */ , NULL AS sq5StlnIsttNm /* 5차대주기관명 */ , NULL AS sq5StlnIsttCrno /* 5차대주기관법인등록번호 */ , NULL AS sq5StlnLoanAmt /* 5차대주대출금액 */ , NULL AS busiApvlRqsDt /* 사업승인신청일자 */ , NULL AS landPchsRt /* 토지매입율 */ , NULL AS rsplCnfnCfrmThcsDcd /* 책임준공확약해당구분코드 */ , NULL AS rsplCnfnCfrmIsttNm /* 책임준공확약기관명 */ , NULL AS rsplCnfnCfrmIsttCrno /* 책임준공확약기관법인등록번호 */ , NULL AS rsplCnfnEprzCrdtGrdCd /* 책임준공기업신용등급코드 */ , NULL AS csucCmpNm /* 시공회사명 */ , NULL AS csucCmpCrno /* 시공회사법인등록번호 */ , NULL AS csucCmpEprzCrdtGrdCd /* 시공회사기업신용등급코드 */ , NULL AS csstDt /* 착공일자 */ , NULL AS cnfnDt /* 준공일자 */ , NULL AS plnFairRt /* 계획공정율 */ , NULL AS excFairRt /* 실행공정율 */ , NULL AS slltRt /* 분양율 */ , NULL AS slltOpngDt /* 분양개시일자 */ , NULL AS moinRt /* 입주율 */ , NULL AS exitSlltRt /* EXIT분양율 */ , NULL AS dvrSqms /* 전용면적 */ , NULL AS dvrSqmsUnAmt /* 전용면적단위금액 */ , NULL AS rentPsblTotSqms /* 임대가능총면적 */ , NULL AS emrmRt /* 공실율 */ , NULL AS unSqmsRentErnAmt /* 단위면적임대수익금액 */ , NULL AS unSqmsRentCt /* 단위면적임대비용 */ , NULL AS sq1YrlyPurBsnErnAmt /* 1차연간순수영업수익금액 */ , NULL AS sq2YrlyPurBsnErnAmt /* 2차연간순수영업수익금액 */ , NULL AS rlesTotLoanIntr /* 부동산총대출이자 */ , NULL AS rlesTotLoanPaiAmt /* 부동산총대출원리금금액 */ , NULL AS cptlRstrRt /* 자본환원율 */ , NULL AS ncrRskVl /* NCR위험값 */ , NULL AS ncrRskAmt /* NCR위험금액 */ , NULL AS jobChrrNm /* 업무담당자명 */ , NULL AS dptNm /* 부서명 */ , NULL AS cplcCtns /* 연락처내용 */ , NULL AS hndDetlDtm /* 조작상세일시 */ , NULL AS hndEmpno /* 조작사원번호 */ , NULL AS hndTmnlNo /* 조작단말기번호 */ , NULL AS hndTrId /* 조작거래ID */ , NULL AS guid /* GUID */ FROM IBIMS201B A /* 딜승인기본 */ , ( SELECT T1.PRDT_CD , T1.CTRC_DT , T1.CTRC_EXP_DT , T1.EPRZ_CRDL_CTRC_AMT /* 기업여신약정금액*/ , T1.PF_LOAN_YN /* PF대출여부*/ , T1.EPRZ_CRDL_PRDT_LCLS_CD /* 기업여신상품대분류코드 */ , T1.EPRZ_CRDL_PRDT_MDCL_CD /* 기업여신상품중분류코드 */ , SUM(T2.DEAL_EXC_BLCE) AS DEAL_EXC_BLCE /* 약정잔액 */ FROM IBIMS401B T1 /* 딜약정기본 */ LEFT OUTER JOIN IBIMS402B T2 /* 딜실행기본 */ ON T1.PRDT_CD = T2.PRDT_CD AND T2.LDG_STTS_CD = '1' WHERE 1=1 AND T1.EPRZ_CRDL_LDG_STTS_CD = '1' GROUP BY T1.PRDT_CD , T1.CTRC_DT , T1.CTRC_EXP_DT , T1.EPRZ_CRDL_CTRC_AMT /* 기업여신약정금액*/ , T1.PF_LOAN_YN /* PF대출여부*/ , T1.EPRZ_CRDL_PRDT_LCLS_CD /* 기업여신상품대분류코드 */ , T1.EPRZ_CRDL_PRDT_MDCL_CD /* 기업여신상품중분류코드 */ ) T LEFT JOIN IBIMS002B s002b_1 ON T.EPRZ_CRDL_PRDT_LCLS_CD = s002b_1.CD_VL_ID AND s002b_1.CMNS_CD_GRP = 'E022' LEFT JOIN IBIMS002B s002b_2 ON T.EPRZ_CRDL_PRDT_MDCL_CD = s002b_2.CD_VL_ID AND s002b_2.CMNS_CD_GRP = 'E023' WHERE A.LAST_YN = '1' AND A.PRDT_CD = T.PRDT_CD AND A.FRS_MNGM_BDCD LIKE #{dptCd} AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT s701b_2.DPRT_CD FROM IBIMS701B s701b_2 WHERE s701b_2.DPRT_CD = A.FRS_MNGM_BDCD );
